item.description:
Whether you are a newbie that is planning to do your first triathlon in 2012 or an experienced triathlete looking to improve, this group has got you covered. There are a lot of great changes coming in 2012 including a group fitness challenge starting in February to help keep everyone motivated through the cold winter months. Join us for a casual meeting... socialize and meet other athletes in the central MA area to train with.

Agenda:

The MassTri 140.6 Fitness Challenge

Changes in the group for 2012

Event Organizers/How you can help

Goals for 2012

Training plans

New group sponsors
item.how_to_find_us: A location in the Leominster area will be announced soon.
item.name: January Meet and Greet
